required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Osteoarticular Infections on Material in Children
clinical_study.official_title: Osteoarticular Infections on Material in Children Under 16 Years Old at the CHU of Montpellier From 2014 to 2021

brief_summary.textblock:
The management of osteoarticular infections on equipment is complex. In order to optimize the management of these infections, the French National Authority for Health (HAS) has published good practice recommendations for prosthesis infections in adults. However, in the pediatric population, this type of infection is rarer and their management less well codified.
The aim of this retrospective and descriptive monocentric study is to identify all osteoarticular infections in children under 16 years of age managed at the Montpellier University Hospital from 2014 to 2021, to study the epidemiology and bacterial ecology of these infections and to evaluate the effectiveness of the therapeutic strategy and side effects, long-term sequels

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with incidence of osteoarticular infections
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the incidence of osteoarticular infections on equipment in children under 16 years of age and their medical and surgical management

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Epidemiology of osteoarticular infections
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the Epidemiology of osteoarticular infections on material at the University Hospital of Montpellier

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with bacterial ecology of osteoarticular infections
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the bacterial ecology of osteoarticular infections on material at the University Hospital of Montpellier

study_pop.textblock: Patients under 16 years old hospitalized at the CHU of Montpellier

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- osteoarticular infections on material in children under 16 years old
- hospitalized at the CHU of Montpellier
Exclusion criteria:
- over 16 years of age
- other types of osteoarticular infections
